overview: A young heiress from a witch coven makes a movie as a counterspell to a course that weighs over her and her female ancestors. Chabela, María Isabel and Bárbara are the great-grandmother, grandmother and mother of this young witch filmmaker who, willing to help with the spell, open the doors of their home—an old family manor in Curacaví, a small town from the Chilean countryside.
title: las Brigidas
